name: Broghman Begins
description:
A quick boxing game made for Dani's Basement Jam #2 by Hydromaniac Games (an unofficial studio of 5 people). Controls and credits are listed in-game.

Timing is everything in this game, make sure to check your opponent's stance and use the right attacks to counter it! If they are attacking you make sure to use the right dodge.

We hope you enjoy, it's our first project! If you're interested to know how any of it was made, my whole development process (as HUBEDYBUBEDY) was streamed live to https://www.twitch.tv/hubedybubedy .
